seeking_immortals.jei.necora.giant_night: Requires wearing Nightmare Giant genetic fragment to be found in treasure loot
seeking_immortals.jei.nightmare: : Requires wearing nightmare eye to be found in dungeons and mines
seeking_immortals.super_nightmare.name: 只有佩戴噩梦基座的人才可以使用这个物品
item.nightmare_base.tool.string.1: Evil Thought Antimony, Blood Cruel Lead, Malicious Mourning Nullification
item.nightmare_base_stone.tool.string: Damage taken increases by 500% when health is full
item.nightmare_base_stone.tool.string.1: But you can unlock the following items
item.seeking_immortals.ectoplasmstar.nig: Double luck, and each point of luck increases healing by 2.5%
item.seeking_immortals.ectoplasmstar.max: All effect BUFF levels increase by 2
item.nightmare_base_stone_virus.tool.str: Any damage received will additionally inflict a penalty of 25% of the maximum health, unaffected by any bonuses
item.nightmare_base_stone_brain.tool.str: Damage reduced by 100% when at full health
Damage increased by 50% when not at full health
Resistance increased by 50% when not at full health
item.nightmare_base_black_eye.tool.strin: Blurred vision from the injury that recovers over time
But you can unlock the following items
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_eye.tool.s: Creatures under your gaze will be unable to move
They will also receive a large amount of negative BUFFs
When you look at any creature, you will gain a 100% damage bonus
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_red.tool.s: Killing creatures increases all attributes by 5%
Up to a maximum increase of 50%
These attributes will decrease over time
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_heart.tool: They will restore health to you
And they will no longer receive any healing
item.nightmare_base_reversal.tool.string: Attributes gradually recover at a rate of 4% per second after resurrection
item.nightmare_base_reversal_orb.tool.st: Resets health to full every 10 seconds
item.nightmare_base_reversal_card.tool.s: The speed of attribute recovery during each resurrection is reduced to 2%
But can only recover up to 150% of the original
Suppress the negative effects of the Nightmare Base at the cost of reducing all attributes by 10%
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: , requires wearing:
Trigger the Undying Totem acquisition when the following conditions are met: Poisoned, Withering, Slowness, Blindness, and on Fire
Kill the Guardian
Found in Ancient Cities, about 5% chance
Kill Zombies to obtain materials, but only one of this material can be obtained
Kill the Ender Dragon
Triggered by receiving Withering damage to get an Undying Totem
Kill the Ender Dragon
Open chests in Ancient Cities while wearing Reversal Orb, 100% chance, but can only obtain one
Kill yourself with poison damage from the Reversal Object
item.nightmare_base_redemption.tool.stri: Increase 15% decay of Nightmare Base attributes
item.nightmare_base_redemption_deception: Resist lethal damage, restore all health
And gain 7 seconds of invincibility and calm the rage of nearby creatures, cooldown 60 seconds
item.nightmare_base_redemption_down_and_: Reduce 35% decay of Nightmare Base attributes, if it drops to negative, it turns into a positive attribute increase
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill 100 Pillagers under an ominous sign
Kill 100 Villagers under the Village Hero effect
Complete a failed raid
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string: Starting from 2 pieces, each additional accessory will reduce health by 1%
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string.1: Starting from 5 pieces, each additional accessory will reduce damage by 2%
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string.2: Damage and health penalty of 50% or less.
item.nightmare_base_fool_betray.tool.str: Makes some types of nearby creatures actively ally with you
Allying creatures gain positive BUFFs consistent with you
The master of the possessed servant loses 10% of maximum health
Cooldown increases by 5 seconds for each target possessed
item.nightmare_base_fool_bone.tool.strin: If a creature's attack target is you
Then your damage to it is doubled
And attacks have a 30% chance to break the invincibility frame
item.nightmare_base_fool_soul.tool.strin: Fool's Danger damage penalty judgment increased from 5 to 14
Fool's Danger life penalty judgment increased from 2 to 9
Each accessory worn increases healing by 3%
Each Nightmare accessory increases health by 6
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill the Ender Dragon
Kill the Guardian
Kill the Wither
item.nightmare_base_insight.tool.string: Reduce the enchantment level of enchanted items by 1
Reduce the enchantment level of enchanted items by 50%
item.nightmare_base_insight_drug.tool.st: But for each accessory worn, this bonus will decrease by 8%
Restore health based on the intensity of the slain creature
And the damage of the next attack increases by 150%
item.nightmare_base_insight_collapse.too: Double the number of universal accessory slots
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Complete all tasks in the medicine box
Die or jump into the End portal to return to the Overworld
Kill the Ender Dragon
item.seeking_immortals.coffin_item: 亚特格拉德的宝贝小匣子
item.seeking_immortals.coffin.tool.strin: 亚特格拉德的宝贝小匣子
item.nightmare_axe.tool.string: Kill creatures to summon the Chaos Battle Axe
item.nightmare_base_start.tool.string.1: Every time you take damage, it forcibly reduces 1 health point
item.nightmare_base_start_power.tool.str: For each positive potion effect present
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill the Guardian
Kill the Sniffer
Open dungeon chests, 25% chance, can only get one
